original_title: Reiko the Zombie Shop Vol. 3 – Bloodline of the Wolf
overview: The long-awaited third installment in the series! Reiko Hime-zono, a zombie shop owner, chases after the "mysterious necklace". Reiko Himezono, a zombie shop owner, confronts the wolf monster alone!
title: Reiko the Zombie Shop Vol. 3 – Bloodline of the Wolf
